The 'rctbayespower' package.

rctbayespower-package.Rd

Bayesian power analysis for randomized controlled trials (RCTs) using brms and Stan. Provides tools for estimating power curves, determining optimal sample sizes, and incorporating prior knowledge about treatment effects using region of practical equivalence (ROPE) for decision making.

Main Functions

power_analysis()

Comprehensive power analysis varying sample sizes and effect sizes

build_model()

Create model specifications for power analysis

build_design()

Create experimental design configurations

build_conditions()

Generate analysis conditions from design parameters

simulate_single_run()

Execute single simulation run for power analysis

validate_weighting_function()

Testing weighting function implementations

plot.rctbayespower_sim_result()

Visualization of power analysis results

Key Features

  • Design prior integration for weighted power computation

  • Comprehensive plotting system with multiple visualization options

  • Robust parallelization with proper parameter handling

  • ANCOVA models with baseline covariate support
